'''1.16.210.05''' is a major update to the [[Bedrock Dedicated Server]]s, released on March 9, 2021, that updates them for [[Bedrock Edition 1.16.210]] and fixes bugs.

== Changes ==
; [[Bedrock Dedicated Server]]s
* Updated for 1.16.210 clients.

== Fixes ==
* When view-distance is <5 clients are unable to connect. ({{bug|BDS-8855}})
* Unexpected or invalid characters in server-name breaks the server. ({{bug|BDS-6825}})
* Typo in HTML help file. ({{bug|BDS-2341}})
